article_title: Iran Pushes to Be Heard at OPEC Meeting
article_text:
VIENNA—The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries is under pressure to prepare for Iran’s full return to the oil market if Western sanctions are lifted, but the group is unlikely to take action on the issue at its meeting Friday, the group’s delegates said.

Instead, OPEC is expected Friday to reaffirm its decision last year to keep current production levels despite low oil prices, delegates said. It is also expected to...
